https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t6Py6jXrJ1SuHU29DdwxYxEwNtf.jpg Inspired by true events, the film narrates the story of women terrorised by a mobster who gang-raped, robbed, terrorised and murdered 300 families for 15 years until he met his nemesis in a young Dalit girl. 200: Halla Ho
